T02D2686:236a-1: badzra bi d'a ra na n'a ma dh'a ra ni ratna m'a la britti n'a ma /
T02D2686:236a-3: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
T02D2686:236a-4: kyi 'grel pa rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba
T02D2686:236a-5: / bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2686:236a-6: ma rungs 'joms mdzad mi shigs ri bo 'dzin //
T02D2686:236a-7: thugs rje'i snang bas nyon mongs 'joms pa'i sku //
T02D2686:236a-8: rang gzhan don rnams ma lus sdud mdzad pa'i //
T02D2686:236a-9: dbyer med rang bzhin gsal ba'i sku la bdud //
T02D2686:236a-10: bla ma'i man ngag la brten nas //
T02D2686:236a-11: dman pa'i don du rdo rje'i don bshad bya //
T02D2686:236a-12: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
T02D2686:236a-13: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje la bzhugs te /
T02D2686:236a-14: lus thams cad rdo rje byin gyis brlabs nas rdo
T02D2686:236a-15: rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so zhes
T02D2686:236a-16: bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gdan byang
T02D2686:236b-0: @236b chub snying po na 'khor byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2686:236b-1: dpag tu med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so
T02D2686:236b-2: // bzhugs pa de'i cho bcom ldan 'das de nyid
T02D2686:236b-3: rdo rje de nyid la thim zhing sangs rgyas rnams
T02D2686:236b-4: kyis byin gyis brlab pa mdzad nas /
T02D2686:236b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje de nyid
T02D2686:236b-6: las ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad
T02D2686:236b-7: pa ni rnam pa gsum du mdzad do //
T02D2686:236b-9: khro bo gnyis su thos so //
T02D2686:236b-11: phyag na rdo rje bdag gis thos te dus gcig na thos zhes bya'o //
T02D2686:236b-13: de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /
T02D2686:236b-14: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis zhus nas thos te /
T02D2686:236b-15: de yang de gnyis kyi don zhes dris nas so //
T02D2686:236b-16: rdo rje snying po las byung ba /
T02D2686:236b-17: rdo rje bo'i don smras pa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje ni 'joms bya 'joms pa la bya /
T02D2686:236b-18: khro bo ni 'joms byed la bya'o //
T02D2686:236b-19: de'i don ni shes rab dang snying rje zhes pa'o //
T02D2686:236b-20: shes rab kyi don ni ci zhe na /
T02D2686:236b-25: brten pa thams cad du thogs pa med pa /
T02D2686:236b-26: thams cad du ma pham pa'o //
T02D2686:236b-27: de'i thabs ni don ci zhen /
T02D2686:236b-28: sems can thams cad skrag par byed pa /
T02D2686:236b-29: sems can thams cad 'jil bar byed pa'o //
T02D2686:236b-30: 'on shes rab kyi yon tan ci zhen /
T02D2686:236b-31: rig sngags thams cad gcod par byed pa /
T02D2686:236b-32: rig sngags thams cad gnon par byed pa /
T02D2686:236b-33: las thams cad 'joms par byed pa /
T02D2686:236b-34: las thams cad sgrub par byed pa /
T02D2686:236b-35: gzhan gyi las thams cad 'jig par byed pa'o //
T02D2686:236b-36: thabs kyi yon tan ci zhe na /
T02D2686:236b-37: gdon thams cad rlag par byed pa /
T02D2686:236b-38: gdon thams cad las thar par byed pa /
T02D2686:236b-39: 'byung po thams cad tshar gcod pa /
T02D2686:236b-40: 'byung po thams cad 'gugs par byed cing /
T02D2686:236b-41: gzhan gyi rig sngags dang 'byung po'i gdon rlag par byed /
T02D2686:236b-43: de las thar bar byed do //
T02D2686:236b-44: 'o na shes rab kyi las ji lta bu zhig byed ce na /
T02D2686:236b-45: rig sngags kyi las thams cad byed du 'jug pa /
T02D2686:236b-46: ma grub pa rnams grub par byed pa /
T02D2686:236b-47: grub pa rnams chud mi za bar byed pa /
T02D2686:236b-48: 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin par byed pa'o //
T02D2686:236b-49: las thams cad pa'i bum pa las thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba'o //
T02D2686:236b-50: des ma grub pa grub par 'gro ste /
T02D2686:237a-1: bar chad med pas grub pa de chud mi za bar sgrub nus shing /
T02D2686:237a-2: sems can gzhan la nus pa skyed par byed pa'o //
T02D2686:237a-3: 'on thabs kyi las ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D2686:237a-4: sems can thams cad srung ba /
T02D2686:237a-6: sems can thams cad rengs par byed pa /
T02D2686:237a-7: rmug par byed pa'i gsang sngags kyi mthu chen po 'di rab tu smras so //
T02D2686:237a-8: zhes bya ba ni srung ba dang /
T02D2686:237a-10: khyad par du rengs bar byed pa dang /
T02D2686:237a-11: rmugs pa'i byed pa'i las so //
T02D2686:237a-12: 'on las de gang ges rtogs par bya zhe na /
T02D2686:237a-13: gsang sngags kyi mthu chen po 'dis rtogs par smra bar bya'o//
T02D2686:237a-14: 'o na ji ltar smra bar bya zhe na /
T02D2686:237a-15: na mo ratna tra y'a ya na mashtsanda badzra p'a
T02D2686:237a-16: na ye ma h'a yaksha se na pa ta ye
T02D2686:237a-17: h'um h'um zhes bya ba sngon du song nas so
T02D2686:237a-18: // de'i don ni rang stan bde ba la 'jug ste /
T02D2686:237a-19: tshogs gnyis sngon du song nas bdag nyid rig pa h'um du bsams te /
T02D2686:237a-20: de las 'og gi phyogs su rdo rje rgya gram /
T02D2686:237a-21: steng gur phyogs mtshams rtsig pa'o //
T02D2686:237a-22: de nas h'um de las bh'um zhu ba las gzhal
T02D2686:237a-23: yas khang grub bzhi sgo bzhi sgo khyud dang bcas
T02D2686:237a-24: pa ste pa nyi ma'i skyil 'khor la 'khor lo
T02D2686:237a-25: rtsibs bcu pa'o // de'i dbus kyi lte ba'i nyi
T02D2686:237a-26: ma la h'um bsams te 'od du zhu ba las
T02D2686:237a-27: rdo rje dkar po gcig tu gyur nas rdo rje
T02D2686:237a-28: de'i lte ba la h'um las 'od 'phros nas sems
T02D2686:237a-29: can dang snod du bcas pa sbyangs te /
T02D2686:237a-30: rdo rje zhu bas rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa
T02D2686:237a-31: zhes bya ba sku mdog dkar po rdo rje dang
T02D2686:237a-32: dril bu bsnams pa rdo rje skyil mo krung gis
T02D2686:237a-33: bzhugs pa / rgyan rnam par du mas brgyan pa /
T02D2686:237a-34: de'i thugs kar zla ba'i steng na h'um ngo //
T02D2686:237a-35: h'um nge las ma bcu las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bcur bsgoms nas /
T02D2686:237a-36: de'i steng du h'um bcu tham pa las khro bo
T02D2686:237a-37: bcu ru bsgom pa ni shar du khams gsum rnam
T02D2686:237a-38: rgyal sku mdog dkar po rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2686:237a-39: lho phyogs su gshin rje gshed po sku mdog dmar nag phyag na rin po che bsnams pa'o //
T02D2686:237a-40: nub phyogs su rta mgrin rta mgo ljang gu mdog dmar po phyag na padma bsnams pa'o //
T02D2686:237a-41: byang phyogs su bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ljang gu phyag na rdo rje rgya gram bsnams pa'o //
T02D2686:237a-42: shar lho mtshams su dbyug pa sngon po rdo nge be con no //
T02D2686:237b-0: lho nub mtshams su aa mo gha p'a sha sku mdog mthing nag sbrul zhags @237b bsnams pa'o //
T02D2686:237b-1: nub byang mtshams su 'dod pa'i rgyal po dmar nag phyag na gre gug bsnams pa'o //
T02D2686:237b-2: byang shar mtshams su rdo rje 'khor lo sku mdog ljang gu phyag na 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2686:237b-3: steng gi phyogs su h'um ka ra mthing nag phyag na ral gri bsnams pa'o //
T02D2686:237b-4: 'og gi phyogs su stobs po che nam mkha'i mdog can rdo rje rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2686:237b-5: de rnams ni zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs shing khro
T02D2686:237b-6: bo'i chas kyis brgyan pa thugs kar h'um bsams te
T02D2686:237b-7: / spyan drang ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D2686:237b-10: aom tra ta tra ta tra ta ya dro ta ya /
T02D2686:237b-14: ghurn'a pa ya ghurn'a pa ya /
T02D2686:237b-15: zhes pa ni gtso bo dang /
T02D2686:237b-22: khams gsum rdo rje rnam rgyal gyis zhes sdang zhi
T02D2686:237b-23: bar gyis shig / rdo rje be con gyis zhe
T02D2686:237b-24: sdang rab tu zhi bar gyis shig / bo dha
T02D2686:237b-25: ya bo dha ya zhes pa'o //
T02D2686:237b-26: gshin rde gshed pos gzung 'dzin rab tu zhi bar
T02D2686:237b-27: gyis shig / aa mo gha p'a shas yang dag
T02D2686:237b-28: pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cig sam bo dha
T02D2686:237b-30: rta mgrin gyis 'dod chags rab tu zhi zhing zhi
T02D2686:237b-31: bar gyur cig ye shes kyi rang bzhin gsal ba
T02D2686:237b-32: dang / 'dod pa'i rgyal po sa ye shes de
T02D2686:237b-33: dang mi mthun pa sol cig / bhra ma bha
T02D2686:237b-34: dang / ma / bdung rtsi 'khyil pas byang chub kyi sems gong nas gong du spel ba dang /
T02D2686:237b-35: khro bo rdo rje 'khor los yang dag par sol cig / sam bha ma yas bha ma ya /
T02D2686:237b-36: h'um ka ras zung cig / stobs po ches res
T02D2686:237b-37: su zung cig / de ltar rtsa ba'i gsang sngags
T02D2686:237b-38: bstan nas / da sgo ba bstan pa ni rdo
T02D2686:237b-39: rje rnon po mdog mthing nag rdo rje rtse gcig
T02D2686:237b-40: bstan nas / pa bsnams pa'o // lho na rab
T02D2686:237b-41: tu khros pa mdog ser po phyag na gri gug
T02D2686:237b-42: bstan nas / pa bsnams pa'o // bsnams pa'o //
T02D2686:237b-43: nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog mdog dmar po phyag
T02D2686:237b-45: byang na rdo rje dril bu mdog ljang gu dril bu bsnams pa'o //
T02D2686:237b-46: de ltar dkyil 'khor bskyed nas ni //
T02D2686:237b-47: gtso bo'i thugs ka'i h'um las ni //
T02D2686:237b-48: shar du padma'i gdan stengs su //
T02D2686:238a-2: spyan drangs bstims nas gsang sngags bzla //
T02D2686:238a-3: de ni sngon du bsnyen pa'i don to //
T02D2686:238a-4: da ni las kyi so so la sbyar ba ni //
T02D2686:238a-5: sbyin sreg rim pa bya ba ni //
T02D2686:238a-6: dang po zhi ba shar du bya //
T02D2686:238a-7: khru gang zlum po 'dab bzhi la //
T02D2686:238a-8: rdo rje dkar po sor brgyad dgod //
T02D2686:238a-9: dri zhim dkar po'i shing las bya'o //
T02D2686:238a-10: mchod rdzas bsreg rdzas dri zhim dkar //
T02D2686:238a-11: rdzas rnams kyi ni sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2686:238a-12: aom sarba bi shuddha:sarba dharm'a: svabh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02D2686:238a-13: de nas stong ba'i ting 'dzin las //
T02D2686:238a-14: bdag nyid h'um du rab bsams te //
T02D2686:238a-15: de las thab khung bh'um las bskyed //
T02D2686:238a-17: dbus su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam //
T02D2686:238a-18: de'i steng du h'um las rdo rje dkar po gcig tu gyur par bsams te /
T02D2686:238a-19: de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rnam par
T02D2686:238a-20: 'joms pa sku mdog dkar po rdo rje dang dril
T02D2686:238a-21: bu 'dzin pa'o // de'i thugs ka na zla pa'i
T02D2686:238a-22: steng na ram gyi mtha' ma na phar la na
T02D2686:238a-23: mshtsanda badzra p'a na ye h'um gis bskor bar bsgom
T02D2686:238a-24: bu 'dzin pa'o // // shar du nyi ma'i steng
T02D2686:238a-25: du h'um las rdo rje dkar po las khams gsum
T02D2686:238a-26: rnam par rgyal ba mdog dkar po phyag na rdo
T02D2686:238a-27: bu 'dzin pa'o // // rje bsnams pa'o // lhor
T02D2686:238a-28: nyi ma'i steng du h'um las rdo rje dkar po
T02D2686:238a-29: de las gshin rje gshed dmar nag phyag na rin
T02D2686:238a-31: / nub tu rta mgrin dmar po phyag na padma bsnams pa'o //
T02D2686:238a-32: byang du bdud rtsi 'khyil pa sku mdog ljang gu phyag na rdo rje rgya gram bsnams pa'o //
T02D2686:238a-33: zhabs brkyang bskum stag dang sbrul gyis brgyan pa /
T02D2686:238a-34: thugs ka na zla ba'i thog na ram 'od 'bar ba can no //
T02D2686:238a-35: mtha' ma na bskor ba ni /
T02D2686:238a-37: sam bo dha ya sam bo dha ya /
T02D2686:238a-39: sam bhra ma ya sam bhra ma ya zhes pa'o //
T02D2686:238a-40: spyan drang ba dang bstim pa la sogs pa rdzogs
T02D2686:238a-41: nas zhi bar bya ba'i phyir gong gi rtsa ba'i
T02D2686:238a-42: sngags las sarba bh'u ta ni sh'antim ku ru sv'a
T02D2686:238a-43: h'a / zhes pas zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2686:238a-44: rgyas pa la ni dbyibs grub bzhi khru gang pa
T02D2686:238a-45: ser pos byugs la nang du 'khor lo rtsi bas
T02D2686:238a-46: bzhi pa gser dang 'dra ba la rdo rje ser
T02D2686:238a-48: tsandan nam dri dang ldan pa'i me la til bsreg par bya'o //
T02D2686:238a-49: de'i don ni stong pa nyid las bdag nyid h'um
T02D2686:238a-50: du bsams te de las 'phros pas gser gyi 'khor
T02D2686:238a-51: lo rtsibs bzhi pa bsams te //
T02D2686:238b-0: @238b de'i lte ba la nyi ma'i thog tu h'um
T02D2686:238b-1: zhu ba las rdo rje ser po las rdo rje
T02D2686:238b-3: gzhan gong dang 'dra ba las ser po ram ser po'o //
T02D2686:238b-4: na ma shtsanda badzra p'a na ye /
T02D2686:238b-6: tro ta ya tro ta ya /
T02D2686:238b-10: sarba satva ni pushtim ku ru ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2686:238b-11: dbang gi zla gam dmar po ste nang du padma
T02D2686:238b-12: dmar po 'dab ma drug pa'i steng du rdo rje
T02D2686:238b-14: seng ldeng la sogs pa dmar po'i shing la yungs
T02D2686:238b-15: kar dmar po las dgug pa'i las bya zhing sreg
T02D2686:238b-16: go // de'i don ni stong pa les bdag nyid h'um du bsams te /
T02D2686:238b-17: pam las padma dmar po'i 'dab ma'i steng du h'um
T02D2686:238b-18: las rdo rje dmar po de las rdo rje rnam
T02D2686:238b-19: par 'joms pa sku mdog dmar po thugs kar nyi
T02D2686:238b-20: ma'i thog tu ram dmar po gzhan gong dang mthun
T02D2686:238b-21: pa las dmar po la ram dmar po'o //
T02D2686:238b-22: steng du h'um ka ra mthing ga ra gri 'dzin pa /
T02D2686:238b-23: 'og tu stobs po che nam mkha'i mdog can rdo rje rtse gsum pa'o //
T02D2686:238b-25: sam ku ta ya sam ku ta ya /
T02D2686:238b-29: ghurnna pa ya ghurnna pa ya /
T02D2686:238b-30: sarba sha tr'um aa mo gha ku ru ku le wa sham ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D2686:238b-31: bsad pa la ni 'di yin te /
T02D2686:238b-32: zhur khrod 'jigs pa'i gnas phyin la //
T02D2686:238b-33: dur khrod sa las byas pa yi //
T02D2686:238b-34: gru bzhi sgo bzhi rgya gram bri //
T02D2686:238b-35: lte bar gru gsum thod pas bskor //
T02D2686:238b-36: phur bu'i rdzas ni gtor ma bzhi //
T02D2686:238b-37: lcags phye rde rje yungs kar rnams //
T02D2686:238b-38: go rims bzhin du bsag par bya //
T02D2686:238b-39: rdzas rnams bkram nas bsgom pa ni dang po bsod
T02D2686:238b-40: nams kyi bdag nyid sdig pa bshags pa la sogs
T02D2686:238b-41: pa bya'o // de'i rjes la aom ma h'a sh'u
T02D2686:238b-42: n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sbabh'a ba a'atma ko& ham
T02D2686:238b-43: zhes bya bas song po nyid du bsgom pa'o //
T02D2686:238b-44: de rje bh'um las gzhal yas khang //
T02D2686:238b-45: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D2686:238b-46: ka ba brgyad dang rin chen te //
T02D2686:238b-48: rdo rje rgya gram nag po ste //
T02D2686:238b-49: gru gsum nam mkha'i mdog can bsgom //
T02D2686:238b-50: gru gsum nang du zla steng du //
T02D2686:238b-51: h'um las rdo rje nag bo che //
T02D2686:238b-52: rig par byas te 'od du zhu //
T02D2686:238b-53: de las rdo rje nag po'i sku //
T02D2686:238b-54: brkyang bsku ma rdo rje nag po bsnams //
T02D2686:238b-55: g-yon na dril bu sdigs mdzub mdzad //
T02D2686:239a-0: khros pa'i zhal mdog stag lpags @239a * //
T02D2686:239a-2: / zhal nas h'um sgrogs dpa' bo che //
T02D2686:239a-3: thugs ka'i / khro bo bdud las rgyal byed ni //
T02D2686:239a-4: lcags kyu phur bu sku mdog dkar //
T02D2686:239a-5: zla ba'i gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs //
T02D2686:239a-6: lto phyogs rdo rje rtse mo la //
T02D2686:239a-7: khro bo gshin rje gshed po ni //
T02D2686:239a-8: sku mdog dmar nag 'jigs pa la //
T02D2686:239a-9: phyag na gri gug phur pa bsnams //
T02D2686:239a-10: nub phyogs khro bo'i rgyal po ni //
T02D2686:239a-11: khro bo'i rgyal po rta mgrin ni //
T02D2686:239a-12: sku mdog dmar po 'jigs pa la //
T02D2686:239a-13: rdo rje rtse gcig phur pa bsnams //
T02D2686:239a-14: byang phyogs khro bo'i rgyal po ni //
T02D2686:239a-15: khro bo'i rgyal po bdud rtsi 'khyil //
T02D2686:239a-16: sku mdog ljang nag 'jigs pa la //
T02D2686:239a-17: phyag na zhags pa phur pa 'dzin //
T02D2686:239a-19: rgyan rnams 'dzin par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2686:239a-20: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs nas //
T02D2686:239a-21: gsad pa'i sngags kyi bzlas pa bya //
T02D2686:239a-22: aom he phu lu ni ru phu lu grihna ku
T02D2686:239a-23: lu mi li tsu lu ku ru ku lu badzra
T02D2686:239a-25: de ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rtsa ba'i sngags te /
T02D2686:239a-26: tshar gcad pa'i lcags kyu dang /
T02D2686:239a-29: rat rat mo ta ni pra mo ta n'a ya k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2686:239a-30: de mo gshin rje gshed po'i sngags te ;
T02D2686:239a-31: las kyi sngags gri gug dang phur pa'i sngags so //
T02D2686:239a-35: m'a ra ya m'a ra ya badzra k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2686:239a-36: zhes pa rta mgrin gyi sngags so //
T02D2686:239a-38: rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang phur pa'i sngags so //
T02D2686:239a-41: ma h'a k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2686:239a-44: k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2686:239a-45: zhes pa ni sgo ba'i sngags so //
T02D2686:239a-51: tsu ru tsu ru tsanda k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'ah'a /
T02D2686:239a-52: zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'o //
T02D2686:239a-53: las kyi sngags te zhags pa dang /
T02D2686:239a-55: tr'a sa tr'a sa ya badzra k'i li k'i l'a
T02D2686:239a-56: ya sv'a h'a zhes bya ba ni gtso bo rdo
T02D2686:239a-57: rje rnam par 'joms pa'i sngags te /
T02D2686:239a-58: las kyi rdo rje dang phur pa'i sngags so //
T02D2686:239a-59: ku ta ku ta sam ku ta ya sam kuta ya sarba sha t'um h'um h'um h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2686:239a-60: yungs kar dang lcags phyes gdab pa'o /
T02D2686:239b-0: @239b de'i gtor ma bstan pa ni //
T02D2686:239b-1: gser dngul zangs lcags snod nang du //
T02D2686:239b-2: dkar gsum mngar gsum la du dang //
T02D2686:239b-3: snum khu 'bru rnams yongs su dgang //
T02D2686:239b-4: de rnams byin brlab rin chen snod //
T02D2686:239b-5: 'bru gsum sngags kyis sbyang zhing spel //
T02D2686:239b-7: de nas mchod pa bya ba ni dang po gtso bo mchod pa ni //
T02D2686:239b-8: nam: sa manta badzra n'am sarba ba lam a'a wa rta ya ma h'a ba le /
T02D2686:239b-9: ka ta be ta ta le /

T02D2686:239b-12: pra ha ra pra ha ra badzra pra bhanydza n'a ya sv'a h'a zhes bya bas so //
T02D2686:239b-14: mndala m'a ye aa ti badzra /
T02D2686:239b-16: be ga ra na ra na /
T02D2686:239b-17: aa dzi te dzva la dzva la /
T02D2686:239b-18: ti ti ti ti ping ga le /
T02D2686:239b-23: zhes bya ba'i glu dang ldan pas mchod pa ni /
T02D2686:239b-25: ha ra ha ra badzra dh'a r'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2686:239b-26: pra ha ra pra har badzra pra bhanydza n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2686:239b-27: badzra kro dha dzv'a la ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2686:239b-28: zhes pas gtor ma dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2686:239b-29: da ni rengs pa'i las bya ba ni dong gru gsum pa bya ste /
T02D2686:239b-30: de'i nang du 'khor lo gzhug pa ni gzugs gzhag 'khor lo rtse gsum la brgyangs la /
T02D2686:239b-31: sngags ma ti sthi ra badzra /
T02D2686:239b-34: zhes pa ni mgo bo dang /
T02D2686:239b-37: aa pra te ha ta badzra /
T02D2686:239b-40: sh'i gham badzra dh'a r'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2686:239b-43: gsang ba'i gnas dang lte ba'o //
T02D2686:239b-44: de lta bu'i rdo rje phur bu brgyad kyis btab la dong gru gsum du gzhug go //
T02D2686:239b-45: rang nyid bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin bsgoms la las bya'o //
T02D2686:239b-46: srung ba ni gro ga'am ras sam gang yang rung ba la 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa bya ste /
T02D2686:239b-51: lte ba la sarba badzra ku lam a'a brta ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2686:239b-52: de'i phyi rol du 'khor lo'i mu khud la gsal byed dgod do //
T02D2686:239b-53: de'i phyi rol du 'khor lo'i rtsibs brgyad la /
T02D2686:239b-58: aa pra ti ha ta badzra /
T02D2686:239b-60: sh'i gham dh'a r'a ya badzra sv'a h'a /
T02D2686:240a-0: mu khyud la dbyangs kyi yi ge tsho dgod @240a * //
T02D2686:240a-2: de'i don ni khro bo bcu h'um las 'khor 'khor

T02D2686:240a-6: brgyad dam nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te lus la
T02D2686:240a-7: btags na / gza' dang rgyu skar byad stems dang /
T02D2686:240a-8: mi bzad pa'i nad rnams kyang zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2686:240a-9: des ni thabs kyi don bshad zin to //
T02D2686:240a-10: da ni shes rab kyi don 'chad pa ni sa'i chog zla sogs pa rdzogs par byas nas /
T02D2686:240a-11: mandala shin tu dri zhim pa dang ldan pa'i thogs tu dri'i thig le bco lnga bya ste /
T02D2686:240a-12: bum pa mtshan nyid 'chad par 'gyur pa'i rdzas dang bcas par bco lnga gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2686:240a-13: phyogs skyong ba'i gtor ma yang gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2686:240a-14: mchod pa rnam par lnga yang bshams te /
T02D2686:240a-15: 'og nas ston pa'i las thams cad bum pa'i chus bsangs la /
T02D2686:240a-16: bsgrub pa ni byang chub tu sems bskyed cing /
T02D2686:240a-17: aom ma h'a sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva
T02D2686:240a-18: bh'a wa a'atma ko nyham zhes pas stong par bsgom
T02D2686:240a-19: mo // de'i rjes la bdag phyag na rdo rjer
T02D2686:240a-20: bsgoms pa'i thugs ka'i h'um de las bam bco lnga
T02D2686:240a-21: 'phros pas padma de'i steng du bh'um las bum pa
T02D2686:240a-23: de'i nang du h'um de'i cha shas h'um re re bsam mo //
T02D2686:240a-24: de yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i steng du
T02D2686:240a-25: rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga pa lta ba la
T02D2686:240a-26: h'um dang bcas par bsams te /
T02D2686:240a-27: rdo rje la sngags kyis bskor ba ni steng du /
T02D2686:240a-28: aom ha ra ha ra badzra /
T02D2686:240a-29: har du aom ma tha ma tha badzra /
T02D2686:240a-30: shar lhor dhu na dhu na badzra /
T02D2686:240a-31: lhor da ha da ha badzra /
T02D2686:240a-32: lho nub tu pa tsa pa tsa badzra /
T02D2686:240a-33: bub tu dha ra dha ra badzra /
T02D2686:240a-34: nub byang mtshams su dh'a r'a ya dh'a r'a ya badzra ;
T02D2686:240a-35: byang du dh'a ru na dh'a ru na badzra /
T02D2686:240a-36: byang shar su tstshinda tstshinda badzra /

T02D2686:240a-39: shar du ma tha badzra badzra /

T02D2686:240a-42: byang du ma tha badzra badzra /
T02D2686:240a-43: dbus su sarba bidy'a badzra badzra /
T02D2686:240a-44: de ltar sngags rnams bkod nas /
T02D2686:240a-45: h'um las 'od 'phros spyan drang ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs la bstim mo //
T02D2686:240a-46: de nas bzlas pa bya ba ni nyi shu rtsa gcig gam /
T02D2686:240a-47: brgya rtsa brgyad thim pa thim pa dang /
T02D2686:240a-48: ye shes rnam mkha' la nyi zlas bteg la dam tshig bsdu'o //
T02D2686:240a-49: bum pa'i chog rdzogs pa dang //
T02D2686:240b-0: mandala @240b gnas ni gzhan du gzhag / kha tshar ma nyams ras steng du //
T02D2686:240b-1: slob ma bsangs nas sdom pa sbyin //
T02D2686:240b-2: de nas thig gi las bya ste //
T02D2686:240b-3: tshad dang ldan pa'i thig skud la //
T02D2686:240b-4: dri zhim chu yis byugs pa ni //
T02D2686:240b-5: tshangs thig nas bzung zur dang logs //
T02D2686:240b-6: de nas cha rnams dbye bar bya //
T02D2686:240b-7: de nas tshon gyi las bya ste //
T02D2686:240b-8: rin chen sna lnga'i phye ma la //
T02D2686:240b-9: byin rlabs rdzogs nas de nas dgye //
T02D2686:240b-10: de ltar zla ba'i mandala bri //
T02D2686:240b-11: 'khor lo rtsibs bcu ser po bri //
T02D2686:240b-12: gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta bas bri //
T02D2686:240b-13: de ltar bris nas rdzas rnams ni //
T02D2686:240b-14: bum pa ma nor phyogs su dgram //
T02D2686:240b-15: rdo rje rdo rje'i steng du dgod ;
T02D2686:240b-16: / las kyi bum pa shar du dgod //
T02D2686:240b-17: mchod pa me tog spos dag dang /
T02D2686:240b-18: lha bshos dri dang bum pa bzhin //
T02D2686:240b-19: de ltar bkod nas chog ni //
T02D2686:240b-20: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs bya'o //
T02D2686:240b-21: aom mah'a sh'u n+ya t'adzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba
T02D2686:240b-22: a'atma ko& ham zhes bya bas stong ba nyid du
T02D2686:240b-23: bsgom par bya'o // de'i rjes la bdag nyid h'um
T02D2686:240b-24: du bsgom nas bhrum las gzhal yas khang bskyed de
T02D2686:240b-25: da'i steng du padma bco lnga bsams la /
T02D2686:240b-26: de'i thog tu bum pa bskyed la snga ma bzhin rdo rje dang h'um yang bsams te /
T02D2686:240b-27: ye shes bteg pa de yang bstim mo //
T02D2686:240b-28: de las 'od zer 'phro 'du las rdo rje dang
T02D2686:240b-29: h'um zhub las khro bo bco lnga bskyed pa ni
T02D2686:240b-30: dbus su rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa sku mdog
T02D2686:240b-31: dkar po rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa /
T02D2686:240b-32: shar du khams gsum rnam rgyal mdog dkar po shel gyi rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub /
T02D2686:240b-33: lhor gshin rje gshed dmar po me shel dang sdigs mdzub /
T02D2686:240b-34: nub tu rta mgrin dmar po padma dang sdigs mdzub /
T02D2686:240b-35: byang du bdud rtsi 'khyil pa d'ur ba dang sdigs mdzub /
T02D2686:240b-36: shar lhor dbyug pa sngon po rin po che'i tsandan dang sdigs mdzub /
T02D2686:240b-37: lho nub tu don yod zhags pa mthing g-yung kar dang sdigs mdzub /
T02D2686:240b-38: nub byang du khro gnyer can dmar nag rin po che dang sdigs mdzub /
T02D2686:240b-39: byang shar du rdo rje 'khor lo ldang gu rin po che gser gyi 'khor lo dang sdigs mdzub /
T02D2686:240b-40: steng du gnod mdzes mthing nag gdugs dan sdigs mdzub /
T02D2686:240b-41: 'og tu rdo rje sder mo rgyal mtshan dang sdigs
T02D2686:240b-42: mdzub mdog dkar po bum pa'i nang du cung zhig
T02D2686:241a-1: bzhi ni lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril bu
T02D2686:241a-2: rnams mdog dkar po rdo rje zhu ba las bskyed
T02D2686:241a-3: cing bsgom mo // de rnams kyang thugs kar rdo
T02D2686:241a-4: rje dkar po lte ba la h'um dang bcas pa
T02D2686:241a-5: zla ba'i steng du bsam mo //
T02D2686:241a-6: de nas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la mchod pa ni /
T02D2686:241a-7: aom badzra dh'u pe pa'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02D2686:241a-8: aom badzra pushpe pa'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02D2686:241a-9: aom badzra a'a lo ke pa'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02D2686:241a-10: aom badzra gandhe p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02D2686:241a-11: aom badzra nee bi dye p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02D2686:241a-12: aom badzra shabta p'u dza me gha sa mu dra
T02D2686:241a-13: spha ra na sa ma ye h'um zhes bya bas

T02D2686:241a-15: de nas dbang bskur byas nas thams cad la rdo rje sems dpas mtshan par bya'o //
T02D2686:241a-16: de nas gsang sngags bzlas pa ni //
T02D2686:241a-18: sarba bidy'a badzra badzra sv'a h'a /
T02D2686:241a-19: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
T02D2686:241a-26: dh'a r'a ya dh'a r'a ya badzra /
T02D2686:241a-27: d'a ru na d'a ru na badzra /
T02D2686:241a-29: bhinda bhinda badzra h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2686:241a-30: aom ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
T02D2686:241a-34: ma tha badzra badzra h'um h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2686:241a-35: zhes brgya rtsa brgyad dam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam bdun rdzogs nas mchod pa dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2686:241a-36: de nas khrus bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2686:241a-37: na mashtsa nda badzra p'a na ye sarba bidy'a badzra badzra h'um /
T02D2686:241a-38: spha ra na aa mram he h'um phat /
T02D2686:241a-39: aom ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
T02D2686:241a-46: dh'a r'a ya dh'a r'a ya badzra /
T02D2686:241a-47: d'a ru nad'a ru na badzra /
T02D2686:241a-50: spha ra na aa mri te h'um phat /
T02D2686:241a-51: ces bya bas dbus kyi gtso bo bdud rtsir bya ste /
T02D2686:241a-52: sgo ba bzhi bsgom pa ni /
T02D2686:241a-53: aom ma h'a yaksha se na ba ta ye /
T02D2686:241a-54: ma ta badzra badzra dza: sphot badzra badzra h'um /
T02D2686:241a-56: ma tha badzra badzra ho: des ni ye shes dbab cing bstims nas /
T02D2686:241a-57: dbang bskur zhing khrus bya ba ni mandala legs par byas la rgyal po la 'khor lo //
T02D2686:241b-0: dmangs @241b rigs la las kyi rdo rje /
T02D2686:241b-1: sngags ni rdo rje la bris la thog tu bzhag ste khrus byed du gzhug pa ni /
T02D2686:241b-2: gang dag yid dge sems dang zhing //
T02D2686:241b-3: gtsang ma'i gos kyis rab brgyan te //
T02D2686:241b-4: de ni thog tu bzhag ste khrus byed du gzhug pa ni /
T02D2686:241b-5: gang dag yid dge sems dang zhing //
T02D2686:241b-6: gtsang ma'i gos kyis rab brgyan te //
T02D2686:241b-7: de ni rab bkrus gtsang ma yin //
T02D2686:241b-8: deng dus 'bras bu dam pa brnyes //
T02D2686:241b-9: de nas ci bya zhe na /
T02D2686:241b-10: zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba'i //
T02D2686:241b-11: mdo sde dam pa mnyan par bya /
T02D2686:241b-12: mdo sde dam pa nyan byed na //
T02D2686:241b-13: mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis //
T02D2686:241b-14: srog chags dag ni thams cad dang //
T02D2686:241b-15: mi bzad pa yi nad rnams dang //
T02D2686:241b-16: de dag thams cad zhi bar lta //
T02D2686:241b-18: zhes pas brod pa bskyed nas ;
T02D2686:241b-19: / da bgegs bskrad par bya ste /
T02D2686:241b-20: las kyi bum pa'i mtshan nyid ni //
T02D2686:241b-21: gser gyi bum pa'am yang na ni //
T02D2686:241b-22: dngul gyi bum pa dag kyang rung //
T02D2686:241b-23: gtsang ma'i gos kyis dkris shing dgang //
T02D2686:241b-24: nor bu yungs kar d'ur ba dang //
T02D2686:241b-25: rin chen rma med tsandan bcas //
T02D2686:241b-26: shel dang rdo rje me tog dang ;
T02D2686:241b-27: / chu yi gser la sogs pa ni //
T02D2686:241b-28: zhes bya ba ni rdzas bstan pa ste /
T02D2686:241b-29: bum par blugs la kha tshar ma nyams pa'i ras
T02D2686:241b-30: kyis mgul pa bcings la shar phyogs su gzhag go
T02D2686:241b-31: // gong gi bum pa yang de bzhin no //
T02D2686:241b-32: de byin gyis brlab pa ni /
T02D2686:241b-33: bum pa bhr'um las bskyed pa'i nang du 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa bsams te /
T02D2686:241b-34: de'i nang du zla ba'i steng du /
T02D2686:241b-35: rdo rje rgya gram h'um gis mtshan pa las //
T02D2686:241b-36: khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa mdog ljang gu rdo rje rgya gram sdigs mdzub brang du bsnol ba'o //
T02D2686:241b-37: thugs kar zla ba'i steng du rdo rje rgya gram la zla ba lnga'i steng du rdo rje'o //
T02D2686:241b-38: phyi'i rdo rje rgya gram bzhi'i steng du rdo rje bzhi'o //
T02D2686:241b-39: nang gi mtshams bzhir yang rdo rje /
T02D2686:241b-40: phyi'i mtshams su yang rdo rje'o //
T02D2686:241b-41: bdag nyid zla ba'i steng du h'um las rdo rje
T02D2686:241b-42: dkar po h'um gis mtshan pa las rdo rje rnam
T02D2686:241b-43: par 'joms pa sku mdog dkar po rdo rje dril
T02D2686:241b-45: thugs kar rdo rje dkar po h'um gis mtshan pa gcig tu bsgoms la /
T02D2686:241b-50: de ltar byas nas gzhan du ni //
T02D2686:241b-51: bdag nyid phyag na rdo rje ste //
T02D2686:241b-52: 'gying bag ljang sngon cung zhig khros //
T02D2686:241b-53: dang po rang nyid bzlas pa bsrung //
T02D2686:241b-54: aom na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
T02D2686:242a-1: ye h'um h'um h'um phat phat /
T02D2686:242a-2: bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig ges //
T02D2686:242a-3: bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas ni //
T02D2686:242a-4: bskyed pa gtso bo'i thugs ka nas //
T02D2686:242a-5: dam tshig rdzogs nas shar sgor bsgom //
T02D2686:242a-6: bdag gis ye shes spyan drangs te /
T02D2686:242a-7: 'dis ni sngon du bsnyen pa bstan //
T02D2686:242a-8: sgrub pa bdag nyid mi bskyed cing //
T02D2686:242a-10: de ni las dang bsgrub pa bya ba'i rim pa'o //
T02D2686:242a-11: bdag nyid gong bzhin bskyed byas nas /
T02D2686:242a-12: bzlas pa'i sngags kyi rim pa ni //
T02D2686:242a-13: na ma shtsanta badzra kro dh'a ya h'um h'um h'um
T02D2686:242a-14: zhes bya ba ni gtso bo rdo rje rnam par
T02D2686:242a-16: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye aa mri te h'um hu lu hu lu /
T02D2686:242a-19: ha na ha na h'um zhes bya ba ni bgegs bskrad pa'i sngags so //
T02D2686:242a-21: nam shtsanda badzra kro dh'a ya h'um /
T02D2686:242a-26: h'um h'um ni sa bon gyi sngags so //
T02D2686:242a-27: aa mri te h'um h'um h'um phat ces bya ba
T02D2686:242a-28: lan bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas bdud
T02D2686:242a-29: rtsir bsam mo // des ni las thams cad 'grub pa'i bum pa'o //
T02D2686:242a-30: de ltar thabs kyi don dang /
T02D2686:242a-31: shes rab kyi don bshad nas /
T02D2686:242a-32: de'i che ba'am phan yon bshad pa ni //
T02D2686:242a-33: rgyud do cog gi rtsa ba ste //
T02D2686:242a-34: sdig pa thams cad byang byas nas //
T02D2686:242a-35: sdug bsngal thams cad med par byed //
T02D2686:242a-36: dpal kun gyis ni legs par brgyan //
T02D2686:242a-37: zhes bya ba ni rgyud kyi rtsa bar grub pa ni phyi'i rtsa bar grub pa dang /
T02D2686:242a-38: nang gi rtsa bar grub pa dang /
T02D2686:242a-39: spyod pa'i rtsa bar grub pa'o //
T02D2686:242a-40: phyi'i rtsa bar grub pa ni rgyal bu las rgyal por bskyed pa'o //
T02D2686:242a-41: nang gi rtsa bar grub pa ni bum pa las gsum du bskyed pa'o //
T02D2686:242a-42: spyod pa'i rtsa bar grub pa ni khrus 'gro ba'o //
T02D2686:242a-43: spang bya'i rtsa bar 'gro ba ste /
T02D2686:242a-44: phyis mtshon nas nad dag pa'o //
T02D2686:242a-46: sdig pa thams cad byang byas nas //
T02D2686:242a-47: zhes bya ba ni des nus pa gzhag nas gsum
T02D2686:242a-48: pa la la zhugs pa dang dag par 'gro ba
T02D2686:242a-49: dang rgyud zab mo mnyan pas dag pa dang /
T02D2686:242a-50: rang rang la rtogs pa khyad par can skyes pas dag pa'o //
T02D2686:242a-51: rtsa ba'i don gyi sgo nas so //
T02D2686:242a-52: rgyud 'di ni phan yon du mtshon nas dag pa'o //
T02D2686:242a-54: sdig pa thams cad byang byas nas //
T02D2686:242b-0: zhes pa sdug @242b bsngal dang bar chod thams cad sel bar byed /
T02D2686:242b-1: dpal kun te 'bras bu bde ba'i don to //
T02D2686:242b-2: 'o na sdug bsngal ji ltar zhi bar byed ce na /
T02D2686:242b-3: 'di'i phan yon dang phyi ma'i phan yon no //
T02D2686:242b-5: sems can dbang po nyams pa dang //
T02D2686:242b-6: tshe zad pa dang tshe nyams dang //
T02D2686:242b-7: zhes bya ba ni dbang po lnga nyams pa ste mi gsal ba gsal bar 'gyur ba /
T02D2686:242b-8: yid mi gsal te gdon gyis dkrugs shing /
T02D2686:242b-9: rnal du mi gnas pa sel ba dang /
T02D2686:242b-10: tshe zad pa sel bar byed cing nyams pa 'gugs par byed pa'o //
T02D2686:242b-12: nyams pa'i rgyu ni rkyen zad pa dang /
T02D2686:242b-13: bar du gcod pa ste gso bar byed pa'o //
T02D2686:242b-14: phun sum tshogs min gang chags dang //
T02D2686:242b-15: lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang //
T02D2686:242b-16: zhes bya ba ni phun sum tshogs pa med pa
T02D2686:242b-17: nor dang lang tshol sogs pa med cing bran du
T02D2686:242b-19: de yang sdug bsngal dang ldan mod kyi //
T02D2686:242b-20: las ngan pa gang zhig gis chags shing 'dug pa'o //
T02D2686:242b-21: lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs zhes bya ba ni rgyal pos chad pa byed pa'o //
T02D2686:242b-22: yang na 'jig rten gyi lhas rgyab kyis phyogs pa'o //
T02D2686:242b-25: dman pa rnams kyis kyang gnod pa ni //
T02D2686:242b-26: bran bza' la sogs gtses pa dang //
T02D2686:242b-27: mdza' sdug skye bo sdang ba dang //
T02D2686:242b-28: zhes bya ba ni mdza' sdug skye bo ni rang gi mdza' bo dang /
T02D2686:242b-30: bran bza' ni bran mo dang chung ma'o //
T02D2686:242b-31: sogs pa ni bu mo la sogs pa bsdus pa'o //
T02D2686:242b-32: phan tshun mthun pa ma yin dang //
T02D2686:242b-33: nor 'gribs pas ni gnod pa dang //
T02D2686:242b-34: zhes bya ba ni phan tshun mthun pa ma yin pa ni dgra bo'o //
T02D2686:242b-35: nor 'gribs pa ni gnod pa dang //
T02D2686:242b-36: zhes bya ba ni nor 'phrog pa'i dgra bo des gnod pa bskyed pa'o //
T02D2686:242b-37: de ni 'jig rten 'di'i gnod pa sel ba'o //
T02D2686:242b-38: phyi ma'i gnod pa gang zhe na /
T02D2686:242b-39: mya nang la dang gnod pa dang ;
T02D2686:242b-40: /'jigs pa dang ni phongs pa dang //
T02D2686:242b-41: zhes bya ba ni myal ba dang yi dgas dang /
T02D2686:242b-43: mya ngan gyis gdungs pa dang /
T02D2686:242b-45: lus sems kyi gnod pa gshin rje'i 'jigs pa dang /
T02D2686:242b-46: bde bas phongs pa sel bar byed pa'o //
T02D2686:242b-47: mi ma yin gyi gnod pa ni /
T02D2686:243a-1: dang rgyu skar byad stems dang /
T02D2686:243a-2: mi bzad gdon gyis nyen pa dang //
T02D2686:243a-4: yid mi dga' ba las byung ba ni //
T02D2686:243a-5: mya ngan la las byung ba dang //
T02D2686:243a-6: rmi lam sdig pa mthong na yang //
T02D2686:243a-7: zhes bya ba ni yid mi dga' bas lus dub pa dang /
T02D2686:243a-8: rmi lam ngan pas yid dub pa'o //
T02D2686:243a-9: de dag kyang dag pa gang gis she na //
T02D2686:243a-10: des ni rab bkrus gtsang ma yin //
T02D2686:243a-12: 'o na sdig pa ji ltar byad zhe na //
T02D2686:243a-13: zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba //
T02D2686:243a-14: mdo sde dam pa mnyan par bya //
T02D2686:243a-15: mdo sde dam pa nyan byed na //
T02D2686:243a-16: mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis //
T02D2686:243a-17: zhes bya ba ni zab mo ste byin gyis brlabs pa bum pa'i dbang 'di dang /
T02D2686:243a-19: mdo rgyud kyi spyod pa bzhi 'am //
T02D2686:243a-21: lta ba dang lta ba'i khyad par shes pas so //
T02D2686:243a-23: shes nas spong ba ste gnyen pos so //
T02D2686:243a-24: shes nas dag pa ste rang bzhin gyis so //
T02D2686:243a-25: de ltar dpal kun gyis legs par brgyan pa ni
T02D2686:243a-26: gang zag des gzhan rjes su 'dzin par 'gyur te
T02D2686:243a-27: / srog chags dag ni thams cad dang //
T02D2686:243a-28: mi bzad pa yi nad rnams kyang //
T02D2686:243a-29: de dag thams cad zhi bar lta //
T02D2686:243a-31: zhes bya ba ni thabs la brten pas zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang /
T02D2686:243a-32: dbang dang mngon spyod kyis zhi bar byed cing tshe 'phel bar byed pa'o //
T02D2686:243a-33: shes rab kyi don gyis gzhan dag gi sdig pa dang /
T02D2686:243a-34: dri ma dag par byed pa ni /
T02D2686:243a-35: gsum ka yongs su rdzogs pa dang //
T02D2686:243a-36: yang na thugs mtshan gsal ba dang /
T02D2686:243a-37: yang nas bon gsal bas ni //
T02D2686:243a-38: byin rlabs gzhan la khrus bya'o //
T02D2686:243a-39: dri ma thams cad yongs spangs pa'i //
T02D2686:243a-40: gzugs kyi dri ma dag byed pa'i //
T02D2686:243a-42: bkra shis rdzas kyis dag gyur cig / smin cing yongs su 'dul ba yi //
T02D2686:243a-43: tshor ba'i dri ma dag byed pa'i//
T02D2686:243a-45: 'du shes dri ma dag gyur cig / sems can klu yi skyabs mdzad pa'i //
T02D2686:243a-46: rang bzhin yon tan bdud rtsir ldan //
T02D2686:243a-47: 'du byed dri ma dag gyur nas //
T02D2686:243a-48: 'gro kun rang bzhin sos gyur cig / phongs pa
T02D2686:243a-49: kun gyi skyabs gyur cig rang bzhin gyis ni 'dod
T02D2686:243b-0: yon @243b 'byung ; / rnam shes dri ma dag
T02D2686:243b-1: gyur cig dbul po rnams kyi skyabs gyur cig /
T02D2686:243b-2: rang bzhin gyis ni dri dang ldan //
T02D2686:243b-3: tsha ba'i gdung ba 'joms par byed //
T02D2686:243b-4: rang bzhin gyis ni dag pa'i mdog / kha dog sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i shel //
T02D2686:243b-5: 'dam gyis ma gos kha dog gsal //
T02D2686:243b-6: nyon mongs nad sel padma la //
T02D2686:243b-7: rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba //
T02D2686:243b-8: me tog g-ya' bral sa le sbram //
T02D2686:243b-9: rang bzhin gyis ni dag pa la //
T02D2686:243b-10: glo bur dri ma dag gyur cig / yon tan yongs su brgyan pa yi //
T02D2686:243b-11: rgyu bzangs dbyibs legs kha dog mdzes //
T02D2686:243b-12: chu yi bdag nyid mi bskyod pa //
T02D2686:243b-13: rnam shes dri ma dag gyur cig /
T02D2686:243b-15: 'o na gsang sngags brjod pa'i grangs gang zhe na /
T02D2686:243b-16: lan grangs nyi shurtsa gcig gam //
T02D2686:243b-17: yang na lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad //
T02D2686:243b-20: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gsang sngags kyi grangs te /
T02D2686:243b-21: rdo rje rnam 'joms bzlas nas ni //
T02D2686:243b-22: rgyal po rtag tu khrus kyis shig / bcom ldan
T02D2686:243b-23: 'das rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas 'dzum
T02D2686:243b-24: pa mdzad do // de'i don ni bskur bya dang /
T02D2686:243b-26: de bas khrus kyis shig pa'o //
T02D2686:243b-27: rgyud dang gdams ngag dag las ni //
T02D2686:243b-28: bsgrubs na dri med 'bras bu thob //
T02D2686:243b-29: de phyir gzhan phan bya phyir brtsams ;
T02D2686:243b-30: / de yis 'gro kun 'bras thob shog / sing+ga lar ni 'grel dang rgyud don rtogs //
T02D2686:243b-31: badzra ratna de was de don brtsams //
T02D2686:243b-32: dbang 'byor zad mi shes pa'i gter //
T02D2686:243b-33: dngos grub 'bras bu bdag gis thob //
T02D2686:243b-34: dge ba dri med yod pa des //
T02D2686:243b-35: bla ma rnams dang 'grogs par shog / rdo rje
T02D2686:243b-36: rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyi 'grel pa rin chen
T02D2686:243b-37: phreng ba zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po sa
T02D2686:243b-38: wa ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2686:243b-40: // / pandi ta de ba phu n+ya ma ti dang /
